oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pardina Arcas, Jesús Javier
Rodríguez-Maimón Torrijo, María José
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The outstanding contributions of Cooperative Learning to two selected projects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The dissertation deals with two projects, a learning unit of work and a research project, which are analysed focusing on some specific contributions of cooperative learning to both of them.
